data.author: Steve Maraboli
data.quote: Happiness has to do with your mindset, not with outside circumstance.

data.author: Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.
Every flower blooms at a different pace.
If all we had were roses, would the thorns then be beautiful?
Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
We find comfort among those who agree with us, and growth among those who don't
Stop pouting! You learned something valuable. Remember the lesson, not the disappointment.
To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
Everybody dies, but not everybody lives.
